t: Brand Elevation: Interview with Wolfgang Schaefer and JP Kuehlwein
s: Q: Why the need for brand elevation? Isn't it sufficient to have a memorable name and be top-of-shelf at retail? WS: People do not want to buy stuff; they want to buy INTO something bigger than a product or service. Especially if you expect them to pay a premium. Your brand needs to matter beyond the purely material - and logical - aspects. JP: You want to build a strong positive bias (or the AI-generated recommendation by Amazon ...
